title: (x) Wiel's vintage cycling jersey script - Radio {Patricking}
content:
Looking to do a shirt in a font similar to this handrawn-scripty font style spelling out ’Weil’s’. Anybody have any suggetsions? thanks in advance, Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312174549im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/jersey-wiels_3640.jpg)

 [‹ (x) McLaren Mercedes F1 Team 2006 season logo - Serene {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312174549/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18888 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) geometric/futuristic sans w/ slanted A - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alt {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312174549/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35482 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content: You might find something you like at [Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312174549/http:/www.sudtipos.com/)…

magnus rakeng’s pilot at vllg is realy good for this sort of thing too.

[http://www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Radio/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312174549/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Radio/ "http://www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Radio/")
